blogPost.excerpt: Your digital assets which are exposed to the internet create threats. SwordEye Attack surface mapping constantly monitors your exposed digital assets, external threats and determines your risk score with zero-setup.
blogPost.body: Your digital assets which are exposed to the internet create threats. SwordEye Attack surface mapping constantly monitors your exposed digital assets, external threats and determines your risk score with zero-setup.
blogPost.title: Know Your Attack Surface - Your digital assets exposed to the internet create threats.
blogPost.author: Seyfullah KILIÇ

localize.description: 您暴露在互联网上的数字资产会产生威胁。SwordEye攻击面图谱持续监控您暴露的数字资产、外部威胁，并以零设置确定您的风险分数。
localize.tagline: 您暴露在互联网上的数字资产会产生威胁。

localize.description: 您暴露在互聯網上的數字資產會產生威脅。SwordEye攻擊面圖譜持續監控您暴露的數字資產、外部威脅，並以零設置確定您的風險分數。
localize.tagline: 您暴露在互聯網上的數字資產會產生威脅。

localize.description: 文件共享做得很简单。无帐号文件共享，无限制。在Starfiles上免费轻松分享文件。
文件共享做得很簡單。無帳號文件共享，無限制。在Starfiles上免費輕鬆分享文件。

next.excerpt: A platform to streamline clinical operations for behavioral health clinics -- including scheduling, patient management, session notes, and more -- so clinics can get back to what really matters: treating their patients. Launching in the autism space.
next.title: Juniper - Practice management platform for behavioral health

localize.description: 一个为行为健康诊所简化临床操作的平台--包括日程安排、患者管理、疗程记录等--因此诊所可以回到真正重要的事情上：治疗他们的患者。在自闭症领域推出。
localize.tagline: 行为健康实践管理平台

localize.description: 一個爲行爲健康診所簡化臨牀操作的平臺--包括日程安排、患者管理、療程記錄等--因此診所可以回到真正重要的事情上：治療他們的患者。在自閉症領域推出。
localize.tagline: 行爲健康實踐管理平臺
